特記事項: 【合併】英語IIｄ　１１（経済学部）/英語IVｂ　１１（経済学部）
授業方法: The text and CD will be followed quite closely. Class will begin with warmup questions. There will be ample opportunity for pair work.

第1回: Start of Fall Term Discussion Questions (two rounds); introductions; instructor's schedule. Paul's Rules & Requests. Text & CD unit 6, p. 53.
第2回: Start of Fall Term Discussion Questions (one round). Unit 6, pp. 56-57.
第7回: Midterm (listening) exam. Text & CD, Unit 7 , pp. 68-70.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to prepare for class and when appropriate, review.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading2: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)
